question: "Who was ""Sports Illustrated"" magazine's first ""Sportsman of the Year""?"
vanilla_rag_result: The passages provided do not specify who the first "Sportsman of the Year" was for "Sports Illustrated" magazine. To find this information, you would need to look up the history of the award. However, based on general knowledge, the first "Sportsman of the Year" award was given in 1954 to Roger Bannister.
